Articles.Content:
Hello there!

KerbalGalaxy is not working. I load up the game as usual, open a slot, and then the game crashes on the black loading screen.

Hi Giacomo, KerbalGalaxy is not a Squad product, it is a 3rd party addon and chat software.

Please contact the makers of KerbalGalaxy for any support.
I was just asking if anyone on the forum new about the problem.
Yep, not a prob, but I will have to move this thread as it's not really gameplay :)

Sorry about that.

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Does anyone know additonal planet mods that work with 1.0.5? Thanks!

None that I am aware of.
Kopernicus has just been updated for 1.0.5, and as most (if not all) planet mods rely on it, I guess they will be updated in the next few days or next week, depending in the complexity of the mod.

Edit: RSS has just been updated for 1.0.5 Edited November 17, 2015 by Gaarst
